body:
Hey guys, Kammy here. I just wanted to say that i have made many friends on avicus and they are great! But i can improve. To some i may be a jerk and i am very sorry for that. I really want to be someone who is liked instead of 50 50. I would love to know things i could do to be nicer and a better person. Also again, if i have been mean to you, or have offended you, i deeply apologize. Please leave things that i could do. Thank you for reading :D

EDIT: I would like you guys to suggest ways for me to be a better and nicer person, if i have done something that you have not liked that i have done, say that.
body_tagged:

title: i can improve

replies.body: It takes serious balls to admit when you did wrong, I repect that
replies.body_tagged: It takes serious balls to admit when you did wrong, I repect that

replies.body: Please i would like some criticism (constructive) so i can become a better community member.
replies.body_tagged: Please i would like some criticism (constructive) so i can become a better community member.

replies.body:
I'm still a new member on Avicus. Therefore I don't know who you are and what you might have done.
My challenge for you is to build up your reputation in a positive way and prove to the newer Avicus players (like me) that you're a cool guy.

:)

replies.body: ik :c me 2 :c I used to be one of those people who someone say hi to directly once I join a game, now its like every 40 games xD unless I say hi. Its just all the old people are leaving and the new people who are coming have no idea who we are :P

replies.body:
You were never mean to me. You always said hi to me and you were friendly C:
We joked around and it was always fun playing with you. It takes great courage to admit mistakes, especially in front of everyone here.

<3

replies.body:
It takes guts to admit that, Well Done!
Even I, admit that my popularity and reputation is going down and I wonder why?
Probably because I got demoted but still, is that a suitable answer.
